reviews.review: hotdog nice
nice

Unfaire Killer, schlechte und unfaire ques für Killer (z.B. versuche Legion zu lernen und komme ineine que voller 1 survivor die Toxic sind und richtig rein Tryharden und am es am ende auch noch wagen Baby Legion rein zu schreiben) dadurch kann man weder den Killer lernen noch hat man Spaß daran.
Und viiiiieeeell zu oft spielen Leute die Hexe die viel zu overpowerte Perks hat.
Die meißten Killer tunneln, sluggen oder campen, aber man muss auch sagen, dass es manchmal einige wirklich coole gibt.
Trotzdem ist das Spiel nur gut, wenn man wenigstens 3 weitere Leute hat mit denen das Spiel zocken kann oder sein Leben sowieso schon Scheiße ist.
Und am ende gibts noch mates die mit dem Killer spielen oder eigene mates bis mindestens  zur zwweiten Stufe am Harken lassen, die werden dafür belohnt und wenn du deswegen leftest weil die trollen kriegst du ne strafe.
Inkompetentes balancing, inkompetentes matchmaking, schlechte maps, trollende mates, toxische killer, manchmal framedrops auf 5 FPS, einfach nur ein erbärmliches und schlechtes "Spiel"

Na hře mám v této době nahráno skoro 130 hodin a z toho asi 100 hodin mám za poslední 3 měsíce. Hru hrajeme s kámošema pořád a je to neskutečná sranda. A pořád mě to i po tý době nepřestává bavit. Hrozně se mi líbí design hry (jak design map, který maj dobrou atmosféru, tak i samotnej interface). Za killera je to dost zábavný, za každýho killera se jinak hraje a má vždycky jinej postup a schopnosti.   

Co mi ale na hře vadí: 
1) příšerný hitboxy (killer mě občas hitne i když je 5 metrů ode mě)  
2) "must have"perky, který se už v podstatě berou jako samozřejmost u většiny hráčů (selfcare, kindred, dead hard, sprint burst...). Chtěl bych aby přidali víc perků, který jsou takhle užitečný, abych skoro u každýho survivora neviděl stejnej loadout. 
3) naopak některý dost over-powered perky (hlavně za killery) např. noone escapes death, hex:ruin nebo insta kill add-ony u Michaela Myerse. 
4) Vnitřní interiérový mapy (Hawkins laboratoř, institut, meat plant a silent hill school) jsou gameplayově strašný (přijde mi jak pro survivory tak i pro killery)
5) Matchmaking - několikrát se mi stalo, že mě to jakožto killera na ranku 12 připojilo k survivorům na rancích 1-5 ;-(
6) Kempící killerové (i když chápu, že to není hrou, ale komunitou)

Jinak hru doporučuju, je to dobrá hra, která vás bude bavit dlouho.
8/10

Despite many players displaying bad manners, Dead by Daylight is a very fun game with a ton of versatility, great multiplayer, awesome environments, and devoted developers that add plenty of new content.

Итак, начну с того, что игра мне понравилась. Весьма интересно, но как ожидалось не страшно.  Вздрагиваешь иногда только если попал в капкан или при резком и неожиданном ударе непонятно откуда. Бесят некоторые кемперисты, играющие за убийц, но на этом то и всё. Игра также любит проверять вашу реакцию во время выполнения почти любых действий. Ах да, вот ещё что, игрушка кста не требовательная.
Рекомендую попробовать всем, ведь игра не дорогая и весит мало.

Gayet zevkli arkadaşlarınız ile indirim bekleyip alın çok eğlenirsiniz . Normal şartlarda 4 hayatta kalan, 5 jeneratör bitirip kapıları açıp kaçmaya çalışıyor , katil ise jeneratörler bitmeden hayatta kalanları öldürmeyi çalışıyor . Her karakterin kendine özel avantajları var bunları başka karakterlerde de kullanabiliyorsunuz aynı şekilde katillerde de var ama çoğu karakter dlc ile açılıyor almadan da oynanabiliyor.(60saat)

Ek not: şuan 200 saati geçtim ve oyunda kanserler çok 4 kişi indirimde iken kapın oynayın münkünse birlikte oynayın ve bill karakteriyle oynamanızı ve "sayılı gün" avantajını kullanmanızı öneririm ,dlclere çok para harcanızı önermem oyun level atlayarak kristal kasarak alabiliyorsunuz. (bazıları alınmıyor film/dizi dlcleri oluyor bunlar)

Ek not: YARRAK gibi oyun almayın oyun bozuk düzeltemiyorlar bok gibi para kazanıyorlar ama aptal bugları düzeltemiyorlar birşy düzeltiyorlar bir yerden bozuyorlar.

Ek not :450 saatım oldu böyle yaaaprrrak bir oyun yok sigara gibi bırakamıyorsun başka alternatif yok

Ek not(731): Almayın kumar oynayın daha iyi

Ek not: 1070 saatim var akıl sağlığımı kaybettim kurtarın beni

First things first. This game is amazing and I would recommend this to everyone. This game has its fair share of problems and I will get to that later. 

1. The time each game takes is roughly 20 mins. This makes it not to big of a commitment to play, which I LOVE! Id like to see a bigger punishment against people who kill themselves on purpose and people who disconnect due to not wanting to play against certain players/getting pissed off. The game is short just commit. 9/10

2. The "grind". I see so many people complaining about some kind of "grind" in this game. There is very little actual "grind". Once you get your first few perks you like, you can slowly get the rest. You can only use 4 perks at once. After you get your pref. build bloodpoints just seem to stack up. As for killer.. you get bbq and chili from cannibal and "grind" the rest for a few hours until you get a build you like. This is game is low/medium grind. 10/10

3. No pay to win in this game. All payments are for killers(who you can buy with in-game currency) or skins. You cannot buy bloodpoints. You cannot buy shards. Once you have the game, you can play the rest of the game for free. Maps are all played free as well. Good job BH! 10/10

4. Playability. I can play this game over and over. It doesnt feel to repetitive even though it kind of is. Sure, you try to repair 5 gens every game, and run away every game, every game feels different. Different team / Different killer most of the time. Different killer builds / You can change your survivor build. 9/10

5. "Ranking system". - Its hard to get rank 1 at first. Once you get it, Its pretty easy in my opinion to maintain or get in the future in my opinion. If you play often, youll get it. If you queue as a red rank survivor with rank 20 friend / friends.. youll probably go against a rank 15/20 killer. F. 4/10

Are there bugs? Yes
Do you get hit sometimes when you dont think you should have been? Yes
Does this game make you upset sometimes? Yes
Its a game ;) youll get over it - and enjoy it sometimes. I just tend to laugh when I get hit in weird spots / or if I die to bugs. Sometimes ill get mad but its okay. Its a game.
